alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 12:58AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Moffat County through 145 AM MDT... At 1258 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northwest of Craig, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Moffat County, including the following locations... Fortification. This includes Colorado 13 between mile markers 101 and 118. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains
